price: Por certo, Allah e Seus anjos oram pelo Profeta. Ó vós que credes! Orai por ele e saudai-o, permanentemente;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتَهُۥ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّۚ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ صَلُّواْ عَلَيۡهِ وَسَلِّمُواْ تَسۡلِيمًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha wamalāikatahu yuṣallūna ʿalā al-nabiyi yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ṣallū ʿalayhi wasallimū taslīman
